# connectionProxyDictionary

**Instance Property**

A dictionary containing information about the proxy to use within this session.

## Declaration

```swift
var connectionProxyDictionary: [AnyHashable : Any]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property controls which proxy tasks within sessions based on this configuration use when connecting to remote hosts.

Prefer using [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionConfiguration/proxyConfigurations], which supports secure proxy and relay types.

The default value is `NULL`, which means that tasks use the default system settings.

See `Global Proxy Configuration` for more information about these dictionaries.

## Setting HTTP policy and proxy properties

- **httpMaximumConnectionsPerHost**: The maximum number of simultaneous connections to make to a given host.
- **httpShouldUsePipelining**: A Boolean value that determines whether the session should use HTTP pipelining.
- **proxyConfigurations**: An array of proxy configuration objects containing information about the proxies to use within this session.
